column4: anyone know where i can get better visualisations for totem? i checked synaptic
what do you mean y better visualisations?
you can try not using totem to listen music, try getting a audioplayer as audacious :P but i don't know where you can get more visual plugins, sorry
audacious can handle shoutcasts, and is a player similar to windows winamp, and doesnt have visual plugins by default, but i guess you can install some.
